ComicInfo.Title: VIIper
ComicInfo.Summary:
Delve into the twisted psyche of Doctor Mindbender as he begins the next horrific stage of development for Cobra's automaton soldiers! When Mindbender's experiments turn against him, can he find anyone to come to his aide in the den of vipers that is Cobra?
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Chris Evenhuis | 1-2 | B | Cover B | Freddie E. Williams II (a) & Jeremy Colwell (c) | 3 | RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive Variant Cover | Davide Tinto (a) & Brittany Peer (c) | 4 |
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-23 16:36:33. [CVDB817511]

ComicInfo.Characters: Baroness, Dr. Mindbender, Frontier, Lady Jaye, Tiger
